thread.title: Customer Rockin' Grandm
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Customer Rockin' Grandm

author: Customer Rockin' Grandm
title: Customer Rockin' Grandm
text: My morning began with an almost flat tire! I was so frustrated, as I had an out of town appointment. The folks at Mavis listened respectfully, and examined the tire shortly after arriving. The repair was made in a very short time, and off I went!
